local_intent: Compute a side grasp pose for the white_plate, align to it, and verify the pose is available on the blackboard.
assumptions: White plate is visible and reachable (or DetectObject will fail/trigger retries at higher level)
Result key 'white_plate_grasp' is the agreed blackboard identifier used downstream
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT sequence around ComputeGraspPose: perception (DetectObject, MoveAbove), compute grasp (ComputeGraspPose), approach (ApproachAndAlign), and verification (PoseAvailable). Uses same target and result_key as global plan.
